name: @rekarel/core
description: Core functions for the language Karel

scripts.jison_all: npm run jison_java && npm run jison_pascal && npm run jison_java2pascal && npm run jison_pascal2java
scripts.jison_java: npx jison .\gramaticas\kareljava.jison -m js -o .\src\kareljava.js  && npx gulp process-jison-java
scripts.jison_pascal: npx jison .\gramaticas\karelpascal.jison -m js -o .\src\karelpascal.js  && npx gulp process-jison-pascal
scripts.jison_java2pascal: npx jison .\gramaticas\java2pascal.jison -m js -o .\src\java2pascal.js  && npx gulp process-jison-java2pascal
scripts.jison_pascal2java: npx jison .\gramaticas\pascal2java.jison -m js -o .\src\pascal2java.js && npx gulp process-jison-pascal2java

author: kishtarn
